name: Nailey
description:
Nailey was made for Ludum Dare 49, within 72 hours.

This game is VR-Only and uses quite a few physics objects in some scenes, so you might need a pretty beefy CPU...

Construct unstable bridges and stairs to get the energy sphere to the end!

There's 7 levels of varying difficulty.

If you're ever stuck or frustrated, hit the next number button up on your keyboard and it should load the next level. 

Your nail shot count isn't kept track of this way however!

Controls are explained within the main menu!

Enjoy!
